title: just hit level 66, didn't get a capsule
body: I see a few other people are having this problem. any word on this by riot?

replies.body: Do me a favor and check to see if that capsule ever came through. Trying to gather some data on how widespread this is and how we could help all around!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3RxtjxIg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-16T01:06:28.318+0000)
>
> Do me a favor and check to see if that capsule ever came through. Trying to gather some data on how widespread this is and how we could help all around!

sorry, i just checked and it did indeed come through. :) thank you very much!
Just had the problem with level 45, only possible solution is a mod giving you one manually.
